sentences.sentence: We will erst awhile before continuing our hike.
sentences.translation: 我们将休息片刻，然后继续徒步旅行。

sentences.sentence: Jerchavin was the really Erst Russian poet, whose poems transcend previous Russian classicism and reject the reality of life.
sentences.translation: 杰尔·查文是俄国第一个真正的诗人，其诗歌超越了此前俄国古典主义的对现实生活所取的排斥态度。

sentences.sentence: Not in the wine - shop did madame defarge confer with these ministers, but in the shed of the wood - sawyer, erst a mender of roads.
sentences.translation: 德伐日太太跟两位命运的差役磋商的地点不在酒店，而在过去的补路工现在的锯木工的小屋里。
